There are two examination rooms A and B. If 10 students are sent from A to B, then the number of students in each room is the same. If 20 candidates are sent from B to A, then the number of students in A is double the number of students in B. The number of students in room A is:

What is R's share of profit in a joint venture? I. Q started business investing Rs. 80,000. II. R joined him after 3 months. III. P joined after 4 months with a capital of Rs. 1,20,000 and got Rs. 6000 as his share profit.
Option D: Even with all I, II, and III, the answer cannot be arrived at

Question: A alone can do a piece of work in 6 days and B alone in 8 days. A and B undertook to do it for Rs. 3200. With the help of C, they completed the work in 3 days. How much is to be paid to C?

What is the volume of a cube? I. The area of each face of the cube is 64 square metres. II. The length of one side of the cube is 8 metres.
Option A: I alone sufficient while II alone not sufficient
Option B: II alone sufficient while I alone not sufficient
Option C: Either I or II alone sufficient to answer
Option D: Both I and II are not sufficient

Option D: Both I and II are not sufficient
